whitebox.interfaces

Interface WhiteboxPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public interface WhiteboxPlugin
extends java.lang.Runnable
    WhiteboxPlugin is used to define a plugin tool for Whitebox GIS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescriptiveName()
      Used to retrieve the plugin tool's descriptive name.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Used to retrieve the plugin tool's name.
      java.lang.String[] getToolbox()
      Used to identify which toolboxes this plugin tool should be listed in.
      java.lang.String getToolDescription()
      Used to retrieve a short description of what the plugin tool does.
      boolean isActive() 
      void run()
      Used to run the plugin tool.
      void setArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
      Sets the arguments (parameters) used by the plugin.
      void setCancelOp(boolean cancel) 
      void setPluginHost(WhiteboxPluginHost host)
      Sets the WhiteboxPluginHost to which the plugin tool is tied.

    • Method Detail

      • getToolbox

        java.lang.String[] getToolbox()
        Used to identify which toolboxes this plugin tool should be listed in.
        Returns:
        Array of Strings.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Used to retrieve the plugin tool's name. This is a short, unique name containing no spaces.
        Returns:
        String containing plugin name.

      • getDescriptiveName

        java.lang.String getDescriptiveName()
        Used to retrieve the plugin tool's descriptive name. This can be a longer name (containing spaces) and is used in the interface to list the tool.
        Returns:
        String containing the plugin descriptive name.

      • getToolDescription

        java.lang.String getToolDescription()
        Used to retrieve a short description of what the plugin tool does.
        Returns:
        String containing the plugin's description.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()

      • run

        void run()
        Used to run the plugin tool.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Parameters:
        args - Array of Strings containing the parameters used to run the plugin tool.

      • setArgs

        void setArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
        Sets the arguments (parameters) used by the plugin.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • setCancelOp

        void setCancelOp(boolean cancel)

      • setPluginHost

        void setPluginHost(WhiteboxPluginHost host)
        Sets the WhiteboxPluginHost to which the plugin tool is tied. This is the class that the plugin will send all feedback messages, progress updates, and return objects.
        Parameters:
        host - The WhiteboxPluginHost that called the plugin tool.
